H0.text: when was the cleveland browns last winning game. 2007

H1.text: when was the cleveland browns last winning game. 2014

H2.text: when was the cleveland browns last winning game. 1994

H3.text: when was the cleveland browns last winning game. 2016

A4.text: The Browns have had only four winning seasons (2002, 2007, 2020, and 2023) since returning to the NFL.

A5.text: The 1994 team defeated the New England Patriots 20–13 in the Wild Card Round before falling to the Pittsburgh Steelers 29–9 in the Divisional Round.

A6.text: In 2020, the Browns won their first playoff game since their reactivation in 1999, defeating the division champion Pittsburgh Steelers in the wild-card round.
